title: The arte of diuine meditation profitable for all Christians to knowe and practise; exemplified with a large meditation of eternall life. By Ioseph Hall.
author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.
publisher: By Humfrey Lownes for Samuel Macham, and Mathew Cooke: and are to bee sold in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Tigers head,
